ŠÄ¯ Å¾aidimÄ… galima praplÄ—sti su "IQ ringas: Nr. 1" ir "IQ ringas: Nr. 2" kortomis.

Name: Der Taubertal-Express: Bahnbetriebswerk
Description:
The strictly limited mini-expansion Bahnbetriebswerk for the new board game Der Taubertal-Express consists of a wooden passenger marker and an additional game board. It brings an additional tactical component to the successful expert game.

How it works: Whenever a player sells goods, transports a passenger to the destination station or uses a black action marker for his moves, this is noted on the fields of the tableau. The player who reaches the last space receives an additional victory point, an additional silver coin or any action marker from the supply.

—description from the publisher (translated)

Die streng limitierte Mini-Erweiterung „Bahnbetriebswerk“ für das neue Brettspiel DER TAUBERTAL EXPRESS besteht aus einem Passagiermarker aus Holz und einem zusätzlichen Spieltableau. Sie bringt eine zusätzliche taktische Komponente in das erfolgreiche Kennerspiel.

Zum Ablauf: Immer wenn ein Spieler Güter verkauft, einen Passagier zum Zielbahnhof befördert oder einen schwarzen Aktionsstein für seine Spielzüge einsetzt, wird dies auf den Feldern des Tableaus vermerkt. Derjenige, der das letzte Feld erreicht, erhält einen zusätzlichen Siegpunkt, eine zusätzliche Silbermünze bzw. einen beliebigen Aktionsstein aus dem Vorrat.

—description from the publisher

Name: 4-PLE
Description:
A 3 dimensional 4-in-a-row game.  Players use cubes or cylindrical game pieces to be the first to get 4 in a row up, accross or diagonally on any level in any direction. That's it.

The game board is a 4 x4 grid.  On your turn, place your gamepiece on any space of the grid or stack it on top of any piece that has already been played.

It starts out simple but quickly creates many opportunities to win... or lose.

On the flip side of the board, play alternate versions. "The Wall" is a straight version that plays just like Connect Four.
"Stonehenge" is a circular version.  All have the same rule of 4 in a row in any direction.

—description from the designer

Name: Ring it On
Description:
Ring It On is a new wedding themed card game.

Be the first player to have laid down in front of you the required items and number of guests.

Players start with seven cards and pick up two cards at the start of their turn. Each box contains 140 cards with different wedding guests and items on... some of which are special shiny cards! Some guests have special abilities and some items have unique powers. Box also includes play money and rule sheet.

—description from the designer

Name: Star Wars: Legion – DSD1 Dwarf Spider Droid Unit Expansion
Description:
Expand your droid forces with the DSD1 Dwarf Spider Droid Unit Expansion for Star Wars: Legion! Favored by the Commerce Guild for the rugged durability and ease of manufacture, these four-legged, dome-shaped mechanical arachnids feature powerful, centrally mounted armaments capable of fulfilling a wide variety of battlefield roles.

Within this expansion, you’ll find everything you need to add a DSD1 Dwarf Spider Droid to your Separatist armies as a support unit. This droids versatile nature is captured in the finely detailed, unpainted hard plastic miniature that can be customized with a nose-mounted laser cannon, flamethrower, or ion blaster. These physical modifications have a practical application in eight upgrade cards that invite you to outfit your DSD1 Dwarf Spider Droid with a variety of weapons and battle protocols.

—description from the publisher

Name: Clic: El Juego de Fotos
Description:
Walk around the city taking photos, be a photography student accompanied by the Professor.

Enjoy unique games, you will always play on a different map, your experiences will be different and the strategy will depend on your imagination.
The map is built with cards and players must advance towards the objectives.

Are you ready to become an expert photographer? Whoever achieves the best CLICS will be the winner of the game.

Pasea por la ciudad sacando fotos, asume el rol de un estudiante de fotografía acompañado del Profe.

Disfruta de partidas únicas, ya que jugarás siempre sobre un mapa diferente, tus experiencias serán distintas y la estrategia dependerá de tu imaginación.

¿Estás listo para convertirte en un fotógrafo experto? Quien logre los mejores CLICS, será el ganador de la partida.

Name: Dado Batalla
Description:
Dado Batalla ("Battle Dice") is a board game designed for the little ones, to share and have a nice time with the family.
The main objective of this game is to mark all the numbers of an opponent with the marker tiles as soon as possible. You must roll the dice and mark your opponent's numbers.
Whoever does it first will be the winner of the game!

El “Dado Batalla” es un juego de mesa pensado para los más pequeños, para compartir y pasar un lindo rato en familia.
El objetivo principal de este juego es marcar todos los números de un contrincante con las fichas marcadoras lo antes posible.
Quien lo haga primero, será el ganador de la partida!

Name: 肛門で語る人生 (Komonde Kataru Jinsei)
Ofrendados, the road to Mictlán
Description:
Ofrendados is a roll-and-write game where we seek to create the most beautiful "ofrenda" (altar) for our beloved ones and guide them from Mictlán (Land of the Dead) to celebrate with us in "Día de Muertos"

The game takes place over 5 rounds, where players draft dice in order to draw "ofrendas" (altars), build the flower path (and trigger bonuses), collect money, and buy "calaveritas" (little skull) cards to improve your altars.

The winner of the game is the player with the highest points, accumulated via the flower path, the "ofrendas", the cards, and coins.  In order to win the player will also need to reach the land of the living in the flower path.

Name: SPIEL die STADT
Description:
Players cooperatively build a city distributing and placing tiles to build a city. There are three public goals and everyone gets their personal goals, representing demands from different groups of people living in the city. Players can discuss al they like before the tiles are distributed but once the project manager hands out tiles, everyone places them without communicating. The goal of the game is to score as many points as possible, representing how happy the people living in the city are.

—user summary

Name: クリスタルと商人 (Crystals and Merchants)
Description:
A storytelling based game wherein an adventurer attempts to sell items to a merchant.

The adventurer comes up with a backstory for the item, then the merchant must add onto it while attempting to bargain the price down.

If a player fails to come up with something to add onto the story or notices a contradiction in the opponent's story, the game is over and the prevailing side wins.

Name: Battlefields
Description:
Battlefields is a tactical combat game between two armies of heroes from the Catacombs universe. First, players spend points to draft their army of heroes, then they place their chosen heroes on the hex-based neoprene playmat. Different heroes have different movement rates and attacks. Combat is resolved by either dexterity (dice flicking) or non-dexterity mechanisms.

The game provides a variety of units for both the Heroic and Lich Lord forces and supports two players. It also features a solo mode.

—description from the publisher
